Replace.Text: No one knows your past and future. Some say you are a god, some say you are just a charlatan, and some say you are a cursed plague. You look like a girl next door. But, how old are you? No one knows. In the ancient land, in an unknown corner, you sent down the oracle and wrote the ancient scrolls. Those words contain infinite mysteries. Then a lucky ancient tribe picked it up and created the great Taicang Empire.
Time is like a song, a long river.
Funny little guy, do you mind if I come over to your place for a cup of tea?

[COLOR:ResCultureLabelCS]Oracle·Fanatical[ENDCOLOR]: After a unit is injured, its combat strength does not decrease by [ICON_Strength]. It also increases combat strength by up to 33 [ICON_Strength] based on the degree of injury, and all units gain +10 [ICON_Movement] movement. Upgrading a unit does not end its turn. [NEWLINE][COLOR:ResCultureLabelCS]Oracle·Glory[ENDCOLOR]: After successfully killing a unit, it restores all action strength and permanently increases combat strength by 1 [ICON_Strength] [NEWLINE][COLOR:ResCultureLabelCS]Oracle·Eye of the Sky[ENDCOLOR]: +3 diplomatic visibility, +3 [ICON_Range] range for ranged units, +3 field of view. [NEWLINE][COLOR:ResCultureLabelCS]Oracle·Longevity[ENDCOLOR]: (Requires Hero Mode) Increases the hero's [ICON_Lifespan] lifespan by 500%.
Your Oracle, the Sky Eye has observed

Added 1 military policy slot and a universal policy slot. Cities can build areas without population restrictions. [NEWLINE]Builders build +5 times, religious units preach +5 times [NEWLINE]Each [ICON_Citizen] citizen provides +1 [ICON_Food] food, +1 [ICON_Production] productivity, +1 [ICON_Gold] gold

[COLOR:ResCultureLabelCS]Oracle·Fanatical[ENDCOLOR]: After a unit is injured, its combat strength does not decrease by [ICON_Strength]. It also increases combat strength by up to 33 [ICON_Strength] based on the degree of injury, and all units gain +10 [ICON_Movement] movement. Upgrading a unit does not end its turn. [NEWLINE][COLOR:ResCultureLabelCS]Oracle·Glory[ENDCOLOR]: After successfully killing a unit, it restores all action strength and permanently increases combat strength by 1 [ICON_Strength] [NEWLINE][COLOR:ResCultureLabelCS]Oracle·Eye of the Sky[ENDCOLOR]: +3 diplomatic visibility, +3 [ICON_Range] range for ranged units, +3 field of view. [NEWLINE][COLOR:ResCultureLabelCS]Oracle·Longevity[ENDCOLOR]: (Requires Hero Mode) Increases the hero's [ICON_Lifespan] lifespan by 500%.

A unique building of the Taicang Empire, which guides the power of the void to transform the city; building this building can provide the city with +60 [ICON_Housing] housing, +60 [ICON_Amenities] livability, +5 [ICON_CultureLarge] culture value, +5 [ICON_Science] science value, +4 [ICON_Faith] faith, +15 [ICON_Production] productivity, +10 [ICON_Food] food. [NEWLINE] Also provides +9 great work slots (can store any great work). Provides a large number of various [ICON_GreatPerson] great person points. [NEWLINE] Each building will increase the success rate of spies, and the effects can be stacked. At the same time, it greatly reduces the level of espionage actions of the original enemy. [NEWLINE] Each [ICON_Citizen] citizen gains additional loyalty and loyalty pressure

A unique building of the Taicang Empire, which guides the power of the void to transform the city; building this building can provide the city with +60 [ICON_Housing] housing, +60 [ICON_Amenities] livability, +5 [ICON_CultureLarge] culture value, +5 [ICON_Science] science value, +4 [ICON_Faith] faith, +15 [ICON_Production] productivity, +10 [ICON_Food] food. [NEWLINE] Also provides +9 great work slots (can store any great work). Provides a large number of various [ICON_GreatPerson] great person points. [NEWLINE] Each building will increase the success rate of spies, and the effects can be stacked. At the same time, it greatly reduces the level of espionage actions of the original enemy. [NEWLINE] Each [ICON_Citizen] citizen gains additional loyalty and loyalty pressure

Exclusive project for Taicang Empire. As technology unlocks more projects, the project will consume [ICON_Production] productivity to produce [ICON_Food] food, [ICON_Gold] gold coins and [ICON_Faith] faith and other conventional resources according to a certain ratio or [ICON_RESOURCE_HORSES] horses, [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] iron, [ICON_RESOURCE_NITER] saltpeter, [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] coal, [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] oil, [ICON_RESOURCE_ALUMINUM] aluminum, [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] uranium and other strategic resources.

Beacon Trade Resource Integration, during the project, [ICON_Production] productivity will be converted into [ICON_Gold] gold coins (40%), [ICON_Food] food (40%), [ICON_Faith] faith (10%) according to a certain ratio

During the project, 10% of [ICON_Production] productivity is converted into [ICON_Gold] gold coins and an equal amount of [ICON_Food] food. Upon completion of the project, +6 [ICON_RESOURCE_HORSES] horses can be obtained.

During the project, 10% of [ICON_Production] productivity is converted into [ICON_Gold] gold coins and an equal amount of [ICON_Food] food. Upon completion of the project, +6 [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] iron can be obtained.

During the project, 10% of [ICON_Production] productivity is converted into [ICON_Gold] gold coins and an equal amount of [ICON_Food] food. Upon completion of the project, +6 [ICON_RESOURCE_NITER] saltpeter can be obtained.

During the project, 10% of [ICON_Production] productivity is converted into [ICON_Gold] gold coins and an equal amount of [ICON_Food] food. Upon completion of the project, +6 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] coal can be obtained.

During the project, 10% of [ICON_Production] productivity will be converted into [ICON_Gold] gold coins and an equal amount of [ICON_Food] food. Upon completion of the project, +6 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] oil will be obtained.

During the project, 10% of [ICON_Production] productivity is converted into [ICON_Gold] gold coins and an equal amount of [ICON_Food] food. Upon completion of the project, +6 [ICON_RESOURCE_ALUMINUM] aluminum can be obtained.

During the project, 10% of [ICON_Production] productivity is converted into [ICON_Gold] gold coins and an equal amount of [ICON_Food] food. Upon completion of the project, +6 [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] uranium can be obtained.
The Land of the Fallen God

Increases the distance of religious spread by 100% [NEWLINE] Increases religious spread pressure on neighboring cities by 40%. Increases to 70% once printing is developed. [NEWLINE] Religious units ignore the [ICON_Movement] movement cost of terrain and landforms. [NEWLINE] Your religious pressure does not decrease when losing a theological battle. [NEWLINE] Cities founded by a player with this religion as the dominant religion will start with this religion. [NEWLINE] Each Shrine and Temple provides +3 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +2 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing. [NEWLINE] Academy and Theater Square district buildings can be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith. [NEWLINE] Each citizen of this religion in the city will gain +1% [ICON_Production] Production. [NEWLINE] Combat units gain +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when in a friendly city with this religion. [NEWLINE] +10 [ICON_Strength] combat strength for units in a foreign city that follows this religion.

+1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for tiles of Charming or higher. Border expansion is increased by 15%. Cities grow 10% faster. Camps provide +1 [ICON_Food] Food and [ICON_Production] Production. Improved Strategic Resources provide +1 [ICON_Production] Production and [ICON_Faith]. Swamps, Oases, and Desert Floodplains provide +2 [ICON_Production] Production. Plantations provide +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture.
Few people can guess what she is thinking, but she should have principles.
Hello, strange civilization, nice to meet you. I am Xing Xuan.
Funny little guy, would you like to sit with us for a while?
Sorry, not available at this time
This small gift is not a token of my respect.
Very good, may friendship last forever
Your behavior makes me feel ridiculous
Great, if that's your choice, then so be it!
Don't be surprised, you expected it, didn't you?
Are you cheating? Never mind, you win, congratulations!
It's not good to play small tricks
